extracted.lv_wall_motion: Normal global and regional wall motion
extracted.mitral_valve: Trace regurgitation, no stenosis, normal leaflet morphology
extracted.aortic_valve: Normal trileaflet morphology, no stenosis or regurgitation
extracted.right_ventricle: Normal size and systolic function, TAPSE 22mm
extracted.inferior_vena_cava: Normal caliber with greater than 50% inspiratory collapse
extracted.impression: Normal left ventricular size and systolic function with estimated LVEF of 55%. No significant valvular abnormality. Normal diastolic function. Normal right ventricular size and function. No pericardial effusion.
